subject: Re: Okay, I think this works... :)
content:
>

I believe it did.

subject: Just a quick hello...
content:
This is just to say hi....
mainly to you, Mike, glorious list setter-upper,
and you, Fletcher...
since the three of us may be the only ones on this
currently inactive list thus far. =)
(My apologies to all others, if we are not the sole three...)

Remember...

Ambience is all around you.

*molly*

subject: Is it up?
content:
Is the list up now? I'm glad someone finally did this. Ambience is god and this list will hopefully be a good temple.

-robert
